pages.text: The Blue Cookies Strain$(br2)Base THC: 17% $(br)Base CBD: 8% $(br)Effect: Linguists High
Blue Cookies Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Blue Cookies Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Blue Cookies Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Blue Cookies Weed in an Extractor
You can package your blue cookies weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
